p: Cyclophilins (Cyps) are a commonly expressed and highly conserved family of intracellular proteins which displaying peptidyl-prolyl cis- trans isomerase (PPIase) activity. Cell receptors originally found as immunosuppressive drug cyclosporine A (CsA) were found [ 7, 8]. At this stage, CsA can suppress the coronavirus, which has raised widespread scientific research interest. This paper analyzes the developmental prospects and potential of cyclophilin inhibitors as drugs to treat coronaviruses, especially SARS-CoV-2, and provides reference for future drug research and development.
